parse: Verb - Present Subjunctive Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: To be faint, be weary. From ek and kakos; to be weak, i.e. to fail.
Properly, beautiful, but chiefly good, i.e. Valuable or virtuous.
For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.
Pertaining to self, i.e. One's own; by implication, private or separate.
Fitting season, season, opportunity, occasion, time. Of uncertain affinity; an occasion, i.e. Set or proper time.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: To reap, gather, harvest. From theros; to harvest.

word: if we do not give up.
parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To loose, release, unloose (as a bow-string), relax, enfeeble; pass: To be faint, grow weary. From ek and luo; to relax.
